WorkItem.ClosedComment: Within the bibliography, superscript is not needed. To use superscript within the text, please check the  FAQ Q9.
WorkItem.Description: Using __ACS - Citation Sequence (superscript)__ in Word 2013, Citation Reference numbers within the text and within the bibliography are not appearing as a superscript in Word 2013. I am not a programmer so I was not able to understand how to make the bug fix myself.

Comments.Message: Within the bibliography, superscript is not needed. To use superscript within the text, please check the [FAQ Q9](https://bibword.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=Styles_FAQ#Q9).
